title: E-Commerce Platform
description: A full-featured online store with real-time inventory, customer accounts, and secure payment processing. Built for optimal performance and conversion rates. Features include product search, filtering, cart management, and a streamlined checkout process.

title: SaaS Analytics Dashboard
description: Real-time analytics dashboard for SaaS businesses. Features include user tracking, revenue metrics, and customizable reports with beautiful data visualizations. Helps companies make data-driven decisions with intuitive charts and actionable insights.

title: Content Management System
description: A modern headless CMS built for content creators and developers. Features a user-friendly interface, robust API, and flexible content modeling. Ideal for managing blogs, documentation, or any content-heavy website requiring frequent updates.

title: Task Management App
description: A productivity tool for teams and individuals. Features include task assignment, progress tracking, and deadline management with beautiful UI. Helps teams collaborate efficiently with real-time updates and customizable workflows.

title: Personal Portfolio Website
description: A professionally designed portfolio website for a creative professional. Features responsive design, dark/light mode, animations, and a contact form. Created with modern web technologies for optimal performance and visual appeal.

title: Real Estate Marketplace
description: A platform for buying, selling, and renting properties. Features include property listings, advanced search filters, user accounts, and appointment scheduling. Integrates with mapping APIs to provide location-based insights.

title: Healthcare Patient Portal
description: A secure patient portal for healthcare providers. Features include appointment booking, medical records access, secure messaging, and prescription refills. Built with a focus on accessibility and HIPAA compliance.

title: Restaurant Ordering System
description: A comprehensive system for restaurants to manage online orders, reservations, and delivery. Features include menu management, order tracking, and integration with payment processors. Optimized for mobile use by both customers and staff.
